put.summary: Create a new group with specified settings. If group with the name provided already exists, then the existing group is updated.
put.description:
Create a new group by sending a json object of type 'group' as given in Models section as part of the Request Body. The group name in a project is unique. Labels can be applied on a group as part of creation.

If a group with the groupName specified in the URL already exists, then this call acts as an update.

This operation is Idempotent.

parameters.description: Azure Subscription Id in which project was created.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Resource Group that project is part of.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Migrate project.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Standard request header. Used by service to respond to client in appropriate language.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Standard request header. Used by service to identify API version used by client.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description:
Delete the group from the project. The machines remain in the project. Deleting a non-existent group results in a no-operation.

A group is an aggregation mechanism for machines in a project. Therefore, deleting group does not delete machines in it.

get.description: Get an existing assessment with the specified name. Returns a json object of type 'assessment' as specified in Models section.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Standard request header. Used by service to respond to client in appropriate language.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Standard request header. Used by service to identify API version used by client.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description:
Create a new assessment with the given name and the specified settings. Since name of an assessment in a project is a unique identifier, if an assessment with the name provided already exists, then the existing assessment is updated.

Any PUT operation, resulting in either create or update on an assessment, will cause the assessment to go in a "InProgress" state. This will be indicated by the field 'computationState' on the Assessment object. During this time no other PUT operation will be allowed on that assessment object, nor will a Delete operation. Once the computation for the assessment is complete, the field 'computationState' will be updated to 'Ready', and then other PUT or DELETE operations can happen on the assessment.

When assessment is under computation, any PUT will lead to a 400 - Bad Request error.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Azure Subscription Id in which project was created.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Resource Group that project is part of.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Migrate project.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: Unique name of a group within a project.

parameters.name: assessmentName
parameters.description: Unique name of an assessment within a project.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Standard request header. Used by service to respond to client in appropriate language.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Standard request header. Used by service to identify API version used by client.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.summary: Deletes an assessment from the project.
delete.description:
Delete an assessment from the project. The machines remain in the assessment. Deleting a non-existent assessment results in a no-operation.

When an assessment is under computation, as indicated by the 'computationState' field, it cannot be deleted. Any such attempt will return a 400 - Bad Request.

get.description:
Get list of machines that assessed as part of the specified assessment. Returns a json array of objects of type 'assessedMachine' as specified in the Models section.

Whenever an assessment is created or updated, it goes under computation. During this phase, the 'status' field of Assessment object reports 'Computing'.
During the period when the assessment is under computation, the list of assessed machines is empty and no assessed machines are returned by this call.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Standard request header. Used by service to identify API version used by client.

200.description: OK. Returns list of machines with their assessment data in the assessment.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

gigabytesConsumed.description: Gigabytes of storage consumed by this disk.

gigabytesForRecommendedDiskSize.description: Gigabytes of storage provided by the recommended Azure disk size.

gigabytesProvisioned.description: Gigabytes of storage provisioned for this disk.

megabytesPerSecondOfRead.description: Disk throughput in MegaBytes per second.

megabytesPerSecondOfReadDataPointsExpect.description: Expected data points for MegaBytes per second of read.

megabytesPerSecondOfReadDataPointsReceiv.description: Received data points for MegaBytes per second of read.

megabytesPerSecondOfWrite.description: Disk throughput in MegaBytes per second.

megabytesPerSecondOfWriteDataPointsExpec.description: Expected data points for MegaBytes per second of write.

megabytesPerSecondOfWriteDataPointsRecei.description: Received data points for MegaBytes per second of write.

monthlyStorageCost.description: Estimated aggregate storage cost for a 31-day month for this disk.

numberOfReadOperationsPerSecond.description: Number of read operations per second for the disk.

numberOfReadOperationsPerSecondDataPoint.description: Expected number of data points for read operations per second.
Received number of data points for read operations per second.

numberOfWriteOperationsPerSecond.description: Number of read and write operations per second for the disk.

numberOfWriteOperationsPerSecondDataPoin.description: Expected number of data points for write operations per second.
Received number of data points for write operations per second.

recommendedDiskSize.description: Recommended Azure size for the disk, given utilization data and preferences set on Assessment.

recommendedDiskType.description: Storage type selected for this disk.

suitability.description: Whether this disk is suitable for Azure.

suitabilityExplanation.description: If disk is suitable, this explains the reasons and mitigation steps.

AssessedDisk.description: A disk assessed for an assessment.

id.description: Path reference to this assessed machine. /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Migrate/projects/{projectName}/groups/{groupName}/assessments/{assessmentName}/assessedMachines/{assessedMachineName}

AssessedMachine.description: A machine evaluated as part of an assessment.

createdTimestamp.description: Time when this machine was created. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

datacenterContainer.description: Container defined in the management solution that this machine is part of in the datacenter.

datacenterMachineId.description: ID of the machine as tracked by the datacenter management solution.

datacenterManagementServer.description: Name of the server hosting the datacenter management solution.

datacenterManagementServerId.description: ID of the server hosting the datacenter management solution.

discoveredTimestamp.description: Time when this machine was discovered by Azure Migrate agent. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

disks.description: Dictionary of disks attached to the machine. Key is ID of disk. Value is a disk object.

displayName.description: User readable name of the machine as defined by the user in their private datacenter.

groups.description: List of references to the groups that the machine is member of.

items.description: Reference to a group that this machine is member of. /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Migrate/projects/{projectName}/groups/{groupName}

megabytesOfMemoryForRecommendedSize.description: Megabytes of memory in the Recommended Azure VM Size.

monthlyBandwidthCost.description: Monthly network cost estimate for the network adapters that are attached to this machine as a group, for a 31-day month.

monthlyComputeCostForRecommendedSize.description: Compute Cost for a 31-day month, if the machine is migrated to Azure with the Recommended Size.

monthlyStorageCost.description: Monthly storage cost estimate for the disks that are attached to this machine as a group, for a 31-day month.

networkAdapters.description: Dictionary of network adapters attached to the machine. Key is name of the adapter. Value is a network adapter object.

numberOfCoresForRecommendedSize.description: Number of CPU cores in the Recommended Azure VM Size.

percentageCoresUtilization.description: Utilization percentage of the processor core as observed in the private data center, in the Time Range selected on Assessment, reported as the Percentile value based on the percentile number selected in assessment.

percentageCoresUtilizationDataPointsExpe.description: Expected data points for percentage of cores utilization.

percentageCoresUtilizationDataPointsRece.description: Received data points for percentage of cores utilization.

percentageMemoryUtilization.description: Utilization percentage of the memory as observed in the private data center, in the Time Range selected on Assessment, reported as the Percentile value based on the percentile number selected in assessment.

percentageMemoryUtilizationDataPointsExp.description: Expected data points for percentage of memory utilization.

percentageMemoryUtilizationDataPointsRec.description: Received data points for percentage of memory utilization.

recommendedSize.description: Recommended Azure size for this machine.

suitability.description: Whether machine is suitable for migration to Azure.

suitabilityExplanation.description: If machine is not ready to be migrated, this explains the reasons and mitigation steps.

updatedTimestamp.description: Time when this machine was last updated. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

ipAddresses.description: List of IP Addresses on the network adapter.

items.description: IP Address of the network adapter.

macAddress.description: MAC Address of the network adapter.

megabytesPerSecondOfReadDataPointsReceiv.description: Received data points for incoming traffic in MegaBytes per second.

megabytesPerSecondReceived.description: Adapter throughput for incoming traffic in MegaBytes per second.

megabytesPerSecondReceivedDataPointsExpe.description: Expected data points for incoming traffic in MegaBytes per second.

megabytesPerSecondTransmitted.description: Adapter throughput for outgoing traffic in MegaBytes per second.

megabytesPerSecondTransmittedDataPointsE.description: Expected data points for outgoing traffic in MegaBytes per second.

megabytesPerSecondTransmittedDataPointsR.description: Received data points for outgoing traffic in MegaBytes per second.

monthlyBandwidthCosts.description: Monthly cost estimate for network bandwidth used by this network adapter.

netGigabytesTransmittedPerMonth.description: Gigabytes transmitted through this adapter each month.

suitability.description: Whether this adapter is suitable for Azure.

suitabilityExplanation.description: If network adapter is suitable, this explains the reasons and mitigation steps.

AssessedNetworkAdapter.description: A network adapter assessed for an assessment.

Assessment.description: An assessment created for a group in the Migration project.

vmFamilies.description: Dictionary of VM families grouped by vm family name describing the targeted azure locations of VM family and the category of the family.

azureHybridUseBenefit.description: AHUB discount on windows virtual machines.

azureLocation.description: Target Azure location for which the machines should be assessed. These enums are the same as used by Compute API.

azureOfferCode.description: Offer code according to which cost estimation is done.

azureStorageRedundancy.description: Storage Redundancy type offered by Azure.

confidenceRatingInPercentage.description: Confidence rating percentage for assessment. Can be in the range [0, 100].

createdTimestamp.description: Time when this project was created. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

discountPercentage.description: Custom discount percentage to be applied on final costs. Can be in the range [0, 100].

monthlyBandwidthCost.description: Monthly network cost estimate for the machines that are part of this assessment as a group, for a 31-day month.

monthlyComputeCost.description: Monthly compute cost estimate for the machines that are part of this assessment as a group, for a 31-day month.

monthlyStorageCost.description: Monthly storage cost estimate for the machines that are part of this assessment as a group, for a 31-day month.

numberOfMachines.description: Number of assessed machines part of this assessment.

percentile.description: Percentile of performance data used to recommend Azure size.

pricesTimestamp.description: Time when the Azure Prices were queried. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

scalingFactor.description: Scaling factor used over utilization data to add a performance buffer for new machines to be created in Azure. Min Value = 1.0, Max value = 1.9, Default = 1.3.

stage.description: User configurable setting that describes the status of the assessment.

status.description: Whether the assessment has been created and is valid.

timeRange.description: Time range of performance data used to recommend a size.

updatedTimestamp.description: Time when this project was last updated. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

name.description: The name to check for availability

type.description: The resource type. Must be set to Microsoft.Migrate/projects

CheckNameAvailabilityParameters.description: Parameters for a check name availability request.

message.description: Gets an error message explaining the Reason value in more detail.

nameAvailable.description: Gets a boolean value that indicates whether the name is available for you to use. If true, the name is available. If false, the name has already been taken or invalid and cannot be used.

reason.description: Gets the reason that a project name could not be used. The Reason element is only returned if NameAvailable is false.

CloudError.description: An error response from the Azure Migrate service.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the Azure Migrate service.

gigabytesAllocated.description: Gigabytes of storage provisioned for this disk.

gigabytesConsumed.description: Gigabytes of storage consumed by this disk.

Disk.description: A disk discovered on a machine.

Group.description: A group created in a Migration project.

assessments.description: List of References to Assessments created on this group.

createdTimestamp.description: Time when this project was created. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

machines.description: List of machine names that are part of this group.

updatedTimestamp.description: Time when this project was last updated. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

name.description: Name of the machine. It is a GUID which is unique identifier of machine in private data center. For user-readable name, we have a displayName property on this machine.

Machine.description: A machine in a migration project.

createdTimestamp.description: Time when this machine was created. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

datacenterContainer.description: Container defined in the management solution that this machine is part of in the datacenter.

datacenterMachineId.description: ID of the machine as tracked by the datacenter management solution.

datacenterManagementServer.description: Name of the server hosting the datacenter management solution.

datacenterManagementServerId.description: ID of the server hosting the datacenter management solution.

discoveredTimestamp.description: Time when this machine was discovered by Azure Migrate agent. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

disks.description: Dictionary of disks attached to the machine. Key is ID of disk. Value is a disk object

displayName.description: User readable name of the machine as defined by the user in their private datacenter.

groups.description: List of references to the groups that the machine is member of.

items.description: Reference to a group that this machine is member of. /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Migrate/projects/{projectName}/groups/{groupName}

networkAdapters.description: Dictionary of network adapters attached to the machine. Key is ID of network adapter. Value is a network adapter object

updatedTimestamp.description: Time when this machine was last updated. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

ipAddresses.description: List of IP Addresses on the network adapter.

items.description: IP Address of the network adapter.

macAddress.description: MAC Address of the network adapter.

NetworkAdapter.description: A network adapter discovered on a machine.

Operation.description: A REST API operation supported by the provider.

resource.description: Resource operated on by the operation.

location.description: Azure location in which project is created.

tags.description: Tags provided by Azure Tagging service.

ProjectKey.description: ID and Key for Migration Project.

createdTimestamp.description: Time when this project was created. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

customerWorkspaceId.description: ARM ID of the Service Map workspace created by user.

customerWorkspaceLocation.description: Location of the Service Map workspace created by user.

discoveryStatus.description: Reports whether project is under discovery.

lastAssessmentTimestamp.description: Time when last assessment was created. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format. This value will be null until assessment is created.

lastDiscoverySessionId.description: Session id of the last discovery.

lastDiscoveryTimestamp.description: Time when this project was created. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format. This value will be null until discovery is complete.

numberOfAssessments.description: Number of assessments created in the project.

numberOfGroups.description: Number of groups created in the project.

numberOfMachines.description: Number of machines in the project.

updatedTimestamp.description: Time when this project was last updated. Date-Time represented in ISO-8601 format.

VmFamily.description: VM family name, the list of targeted azure locations and the category of the family.

acceptLanguage.name: Accept-Language
acceptLanguage.description: Standard request header. Used by service to respond to client in appropriate language.

api-version.name: api-version
api-version.description: Standard request header. Used by service to identify API version used by client.

assessedMachineName.name: assessedMachineName
assessedMachineName.description: Unique name of an assessed machine evaluated as part of an assessment.

assessmentName.name: assessmentName
assessmentName.description: Unique name of an assessment within a project.

groupName.name: groupName
groupName.description: Unique name of a group within a project.

locationName.name: locationName
locationName.description: Azure region in which the project is created.

machineName.name: machineName
machineName.description: Unique name of a machine in private datacenter.

projectName.name: projectName
projectName.description: Name of the Azure Migrate project.

resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Azure Resource Group that project is part of.

subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionId.description: Azure Subscription Id in which project was created.
